issue.title: Can't spawn atlas without hands for drc_practice and vrc_final

content.raw:
We implemented a system that uses the environment variables 

* VIGIR_ATLAS_ROBOT_TYPE
* VIGIR_ATLAS_LEFT_HAND_TYPE
* VIGIR_ATLAS_RIGHT_HAND_TYPE

to generate the robot model via xacro at launch time (and also load via launch files all the appropriate controllers etc. for both simulated and real robot). Especially preceding the Trials it was a very important use-case for us to be able to change the hands on the robot quickly and independently of each other for both sides. I think the hand_suffix and model_args approach is a step in the right direction, but it would be good to be able to change hands independently of each other. Not sure if this environment variable-based approach is practical for drcsim (probably not), just throwing out there that it would be nice to be able to select components independently of each other.
